archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Microsoft Azure
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Microsoft Azure is a cloud computing platform that offers a wide range of services and tools for building, deploying, and managing applications and services through Microsoft's global network of data centers. With Azure, developers can build, test, and deploy applications and services on a secure and scalable platform that supports multiple programming languages, frameworks, and tools. The platform offers a variety of services including virtual machines, storage, networking, databases, analytics, artificial intelligence, and more. Additionally, Azure provides various deployment models, including public, private, and hybrid clouds, enabling users to choose the right deployment option for their specific needs.
